achievements.description: Method returns information about players' achievements. Accounts with hidden game profiles are excluded from response. Hidden profiles are listed in the field meta.hidden.
achievements.name: Player's achievements

parameters.description: Application ID
parameters.name: application_id

parameters.description:
Localization language. Default is "ru". Valid values:

  • "cs" — Čeština
  • "de" — Deutsch
  • "en" — English
  • "es" — Español
  • "fr" — Français
  • "ja" — 日本語
  • "pl" — Polski
  • "ru" — Русский (by default)
  • "th" — ไทย
  • "zh-tw" — 繁體中文
  • "tr" — Türkçe
  • "zh-cn" — 中文
  • "pt-br" — Português do Brasil
  • "es-mx" — Español (México)
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Access token for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Player account ID. Maximum limit: 100. Min value is 1.
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description:
Search type. Default is "startswith". Valid values:

  • "startswith" — Search by initial characters of player name. Minimum length: 3 characters. Maximum length: 24 characters. (by default)
  • "exact" — Search by exact match of player name. Case insensitive. You can enter several names, separated with commas (up to 100).

parameters.description: Player name search string. Parameter "type" defines minimum length and type of search. Using the exact search type, you can enter several names, separated with commas. Maximum length: 24.

parameters.description: Number of returned entries (fewer can be returned, but not more than 100). If the limit sent exceeds 100, a limit of 100 is applied (by default).

The type of the bonus that is provided to the clan members after building the installation. Existing bonus types:

  • exp_boost—rate of additional XP;
  • members_count—number of clan members on which the clan size is increased;
  • maintenance_discount—rate of reducing cost of servicing ships;
  • purchase_discount—rate of reducing cost of researched ships;
  • dummy—no bonuses.

name: buildings

stats.name: Statistics of player's ships

parameters.description: Application ID
parameters.name: application_id

parameters.description:
Localization language. Default is "ru". Valid values:

  • "cs" — Čeština
  • "de" — Deutsch
  • "en" — English
  • "es" — Español
  • "fr" — Français
  • "ja" — 日本語
  • "pl" — Polski
  • "ru" — Русский (by default)
  • "th" — ไทย
  • "zh-tw" — 繁體中文
  • "tr" — Türkçe
  • "zh-cn" — 中文
  • "pt-br" — Português do Brasil
  • "es-mx" — Español (México)
parameters.name: language

parameters.description: Response field. The fields are separated with commas. Embedded fields are separated with dots. To exclude a field, use “-” in front of its name. In case the parameter is not defined, the method returns all fields. Maximum limit: 100.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Access token for the private data of a user's account; can be received via the authorization method; valid within a stated time period
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description:
Extra fields that will be added to the response. Valid values:

  • "club"
  • "oper_div"
  • "oper_div_hard"
  • "oper_solo"
  • "pve"
  • "pve_div2"
  • "pve_div3"
  • "pve_solo"
  • "pvp_div2"
  • "pvp_div3"
  • "pvp_solo"
  • "rank_div2"
  • "rank_div3"
  • "rank_solo"
parameters.name: extra

parameters.description: Player account ID
parameters.name: account_id

parameters.description: Player's ship ID. Maximum limit: 100.
parameters.name: ship_id

parameters.description:
Filter by ship availability in the Port. If the parameter is not specified, all ships are returned. Parameter processing requires a valid access_token for the specified account_id. Valid values:

  • "1" — Return ships available in the Port.
  • "0" — Return ships that are no longer in the Port.
parameters.name: in_garage
